name: Cultus
description:
A young man tries to uncover clues about his nightmares, but he soon realizes that this is a massive mistake.
Play with friends in the new Halloween Multiplayer Update!

Discover Long Lost Secrets

Cultus is a pixelated, 2D, Horror game in which you play as a young man searching for clues to the horrors that haunt him. Roam through the location of a horrific shootout between a Cultish group and the police to finally discover what has been calling you b̷͎̬͔͋̍͋͘͝ā̶̢̞̗̣̓ç̷̦̙̟̑̌́̎k̴̨̘͙̿ there for years.

Escape While You Still Can

Cultus takes the player through a short story in which much is discovered about the horrific past of this location, and it is left up to the player to get out or repeat the actions of the past...
Cultus' art design is entirely inspired by the artists vivid nightmares and over active imagination, bringing you, the player, an interactive, intriguing, and scary experience.

Play With Friends!

With the new Halloween Multiplayer Update, you and up to 9 other friends can play together in an attempt to find all the keys needed to escape. However, your friends may not necessarily be on your side. Up to 2 people can play as The Cult, who must stop The Survivors from finding all the keys by hunting them down. This new gamemode brings a new definition of unscripted to Cultus, and provides for fun, exciting, and entertaining moments.
